gurmukhi: inj Pqy bulweI siqgurU kIno aujIAwrw [
transliteration: nij fathae bulaaee sathiguroo keeno oujeeaaraa |a
translation: Himself, the True Guru invoked Fateh, the greeting of victory, and spread the divine light.

gurmukhi: JUT kpt sB CY BieE sB sc vrqwrw [
transliteration: jhooth kapatt sabh shai bhaeiou sabh sach varathaaraa |a
translation: The falsehood and maliciousness vanished and truth triumphed.

gurmukhi: iPr jg hom Tihrwie kY inj Drm svwrw [
transliteration: fir jag hom thehiraae kai nij dharam savaaraa |a
translation: Desisting from the (rituals of) Yajana and Havana, righteousness was promoted.

gurmukhi: qurk duMd sB auT gieE ricE jYkwrw [
transliteration: thurak dhundh sabh outh gaeiou rachiou jaikaaraa |a
translation: All the contention of Turks were eliminated, and the (Khalsa) ovation was permeated.

gurmukhi: jh aupjy isMG mhW blI Kwls inrDwrw [
transliteration: jeh oupajae singh mehaa(n) balee khaalas niradhaaraa |a
translation: Thus were promulgated Singhs, the emphatic and the righteous ones.

gurmukhi: sB jb iqnhUM bs kIE jp AlK Apwrw [
transliteration: sabh jab thinehoon bas keeou jap alakh apaaraa |a
translation: The whole world was brought to order and they meditated upon the magnanimous invisible.

gurmukhi: gur Drm ismir jg cmikE imitE AMiDAwrw [
transliteration: gur dharam simar jag chamakiou mittiou andhiaaraa |a
translation: Deliberating on the Guru's Righteous-path, (celestial) light beamed and the darkness (of the ignorance) was effaced.

gurmukhi: qb kusl Kym AwnMd isauN bisE sMswrw [
transliteration: thab kusal khaem aanandh sio basiou sansaaraa |a
translation: And then the happiness, welfare and bliss prospered in the whole world.

gurmukhi: hir vwihgurU mMqr AgMm jg qwrnhwrw [
transliteration: har vaahiguroo manthar aganm jag thaaranehaaraa |a
translation: The emancipator Guru (advanced) the incantation of Har, Wahiguru, God the Supreme, Har, Wahiguru.

gurmukhi: jo ismrih nr pRym isau phuMcY drbwrw [
transliteration: jo simarehi nar praem sio pahunchai dharabaaraa |a
translation: The ones who meditates with devotion, realise the sublime court.

gurmukhi: sB pkVo crn goibMd ky Cwfo jMjwrw [
transliteration: sabh pakarro charan gobindh kae shaaddo janjaaraa |a
translation: Embrace (you) all at the Guru's feet and get red of the perplexities.

gurmukhi: nwqru drgh kutIAnu mnmuiK kUiVAwrw [
transliteration: naathar dharageh kutteean manamukh koorriaaraa |a
translation: Only the egocentric and the false ones get punished in the Righteous Court.

gurmukhi: qh CutY soeI ju hir Bjy sB qjY ibkwrw [
transliteration: theh shuttai soee j har bhajae sabh thajai bikaaraa |a
translation: Only they, who ponder over Har, accomplish the astral heights and the rest remain fruitless.

gurmukhi: ies mn cMcl kau Gyr kir ismrY krqwrw [
transliteration: eis man chanchal ko ghaer kar simarai karathaaraa |a
translation: By controlling the inconsistent mind, remember the Creator.

gurmukhi: qb phuMcY hir hukm isauN inj dsvyN duAwrw [
transliteration: thab pahunchai har hukam sio nij dhasavae dhuaaraa |a
translation: Then with the heavenly command, one overwhelms the tenth door (of inner soul),

gurmukhi: iPr ieauN sihjy BytY ggn mYN Awqm inrDwrw [
transliteration: fir eio sehijae bhaettai gagan mai aatham niradhaaraa |a
translation: And intuitively presents himself in the Godly domain for spiritual judgement.

gurmukhi: qb vY inrKYNgy surg mih AwnMd suhylw [
transliteration: thab vai nirakhaigae surag mehi aanandh suhaelaa |a
translation: Sequentially, in the heaven, his spiritual evaluation is appreciated.

gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG Awpy guru cylw ]18]
transliteration: vaah vaah gobindh singh aapae gur chaelaa | 18 |
translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

gurmukhi: vih aupijE cylw mrd kw mrdwn sdwey [
transliteration: vehi oupajiou chaelaa maradh kaa maradhaan sadhaaeae |a
translation: Hail! God's disciple was born and recognised as a great hero.

gurmukhi: ijin sB ipRQvI kau jIq kir nIswn Julwey [
transliteration: jin sabh prithavee ko jeeth kar neesaan jhulaaeae |a
translation: He triumphed over the whole world and unfurled the sacred flags.

gurmukhi: qb isMGn kau bKs kir bhu suK idKlwey [
transliteration: thab singhan ko bakhas kar bahu sukh dhikhalaaeae |a
translation: Protected all the Singhs, and endowed them with bliss.

gurmukhi: iPr sB ipRQvI ky aUpry hwkm Tihrwey [
transliteration: fir sabh prithavee kae ooparae haakam thehiraaeae |a
translation: Then controlled the entire society, and explained the commands.

gurmukhi: iqnhUN jgq sMBwl kir AwnMd rcwey [
transliteration: thinehoo jagath sanbhaal kar aanandh rachaaeae |a
translation: Promoted good order in the world and inspired exhilaration.

gurmukhi: qh ismir ismir Akwl kau hir hir gun gwey [
transliteration: theh simar simar akaal ko har har gun gaaeae |a
translation: Meditated and ruminated over the Timeless One, and glorified Har, the God Almighty.

gurmukhi: vwh guru goibMd ZwzI sbl ijin isMG jgwey [
transliteration: vaah gur gobindh ghaazee sabal jin singh jagaaeae |a
translation: Exalted Guru Gobind Singh instituted mighty crusading Singhs.

gurmukhi: qb BieE jgq sB Kwlsw mnmuK Brmwey [
transliteration: thab bhaeiou jagath sabh khaalasaa manamukh bharamaaeae |a
translation: Thus abounded in the world, Khalsa, the righteous ones, and the heretics were deluded.

gurmukhi: ieauN auiT Bbky bl bIr isMG SsqR cmkwey [
transliteration: eio outh bhabakae bal beer singh shasathr chamakaaeae |a
translation: The mighty Singhs rose and made their arms to shine.

gurmukhi: qb sB qurkn kau Cyd kir Akwl jpwey [
transliteration: thab sabh thurakan ko shaedh kar akaal japaaeae |a
translation: All the Turks were subjugated and made to ponder over the Timeless.

gurmukhi: sB CqRpqI cuin cuin hqy khUM itkin n pwey [
transliteration: sabh shathrapathee chun chun hathae kehoon ttikan n paaeae |a
translation: Putting aside all the Kashatriyas, they let them had no peace.

gurmukhi: qb jg mY Drm prgwisE scu hukm clwey [
transliteration: thab jag mai dharam paragaasiou sach hukam chalaaeae |a
translation: The righteousness manifested the world and Truth was proclaimed.

gurmukhi: Xh bwrh sdI inbyV kir gurU Pqy bulwey [
transliteration: yeh baareh sadhee nibaerr kar guroo fathae bulaaeae |a
translation: Eradicating the influence of twelve centuries, the Guru's slogan ravelled,

gurmukhi: qb dust mlyC sihjy Kpy Cl kpt aufwey [
transliteration: thab dhusatt malaesh sehijae khapae shal kapatt ouddaaeae |a
translation: Which indulgently invalidated all the enemies and barbarians, and the hypocrisy took to its wings.

gurmukhi: ieauN hir Akwl ky hukm soN rx juD mcwey [
transliteration: eio har akaal kae hukam so ran judh machaaeae |a
translation: The world was won over thus and truth was crowned, and set on its throne.

gurmukhi: qb kUdy isMG BujMgIey dl ktk aufwey [
transliteration: thab koodhae singh bhujangeeeae dhal kattak ouddaaeae |a
translation: The world was consoled, and the devotees were induced towards Har.

gurmukhi: ieauN Pqy BeI jg jIq kir scu qKq rcwey [
transliteration: eio fathae bhee jag jeeth kar sach thakhath rachaaeae |a
translation: All the humanity was blessed and the afflictions were wiped out.

gurmukhi: bhu dIE idlwsw jgq ko hir Bgq idRVwey [
transliteration: bahu dheeou dhilaasaa jagath ko har bhagath dhrirraaeae |a
translation: Then with the eternal benediction, the anxiety in the world was alleviated.

gurmukhi: qb sB ipRQvI suKIAw BeI duK drd gvwey [
transliteration: thab sabh prithavee sukheeaa bhee dhukh dharadh gavaaeae |a

gurmukhi: iPr suK inhcl bKisE jgq BY qRws cukwey [
transliteration: fir sukh nihachal bakhasiou jagath bhai thraas chukaaeae |a

gurmukhi: gurdws KVw dr pkiV kY ieauN aucir suxwey [
transliteration: guradhaas kharraa dhar pakarr kai eio ouchar sunaaeae |a
translation: Gurdas, leaning on the door, was eulogising this;

gurmukhi: hy siqgur jMjwl qy muih muih lyhu Cfwey [
transliteration: hae sathigur janjaal thae muhi muhi laehu shaddaaeae |a
translation: `Oh my True Lord! Please save me from the trepidation of the Yamas.

gurmukhi: jb hauN dwsn ko dwsrw gur tihl kmwey [
transliteration: jab ho dhaasan ko dhaasaraa gur ttehil kamaaeae |a
translation: `Enable me, the servant of servants, to earn the favour of the Guru,

gurmukhi: qb CUtY bMDn skl Pun iPir nrik n jwey [
transliteration: thab shoottai bandhan sakal fun fir narak n jaaeae |a
translation: `So that all the restraints are erased, and one retreats not to the hell.'

gurmukhi: hir dwsW icMidAw sd sdw gur sMgiq mylw [
transliteration: har dhaasaa(n) chindhiaa sadh sadhaa gur sangath maelaa |a
translation: Har was always anxious for his devotees and, thus, the devotees's (divine) union was obvious.

gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG Awpy guru cylw ]19]
transliteration: vaah vaah gobindh singh aapae gur chaelaa | 19 |
translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.
